rules.description: Change shift + delete to forward delete
Change left and right shift to ( and ) respectively when pressed alone. Otherwise, post shift.
Change forward delete key to command+control+option+shift. (Post none key when pressed alone)
Vi Mode #1d (conflict with #1) [D + H/J/K/L → Arrow Keys]
Vi Mode #3 (require #1/1d & #2) [S/D + F + H/J/K/L → Home / Page Down / Page Up / End]
